datasets.description: Name, address, geographic location of pharmacies and their distance (km) to the  closest  air quality monitoring station.

datasets.description: Estimates of the proportion of all drugs dispensed each day at each pharmacy that are prescribed for respiratory illnesses such as asthma.
datasets.name: pharmacy_adjusted_daily_dispense.csv
datasets.title: Daily Proportion of Drugs Dispensed by Pharmacy for Respiratory Illnesses

datasets.description: Only PM 10 air pollution daily reading from year 2013 to 2016 have been downloaded from Data BC web site

datasets.description: Contains ID, address, latitude, longitude, zone etc. of AMSs in BC
